description: This file is a startup script that manages the setup and initialization of a MySQL database server, including starting the server, applying database migrations, seeding data, and configuring database users and permissions.

methods.name: run_sql_file
methods.description: Helper function to run an SQL script file using available connection methods, preferring a connection info file, socket, or TCP connection.

methods.name: apply_migrations
methods.description: Helper function to apply database migration scripts in order and keep track of applied migrations.

methods.name: apply_seed
methods.description: Helper function to seed initial data into the database if not already present.
